about_the_game:
You are again behind the mysterious control panel of omnipotence. Explore it and solve riddles. In the continuation of the game VICCP 2 Core, you have to find many endings, of which there are more.

The game is a retro sci-fi in which you can spend time atmospherically. There is no need to hurry, this is a busy board but for adults. Many different switches and buttons, levers, displays. Feedback from the first part was taken into account and no more giant puzzles, instead an increased number of atmospheric places.

PECULIARITIES:

  • More puzzles
  • More atmospheric music
  • More old school spirit
  • More endings
  • Even more achievements
  • Even more retro sci-fi and cyberpunk atmosphere.
  • There are no stuffy giant puzzles, as in the first part.

name: VICCP 2 Core

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (x64)
  • Processor: 3GHz Duo Core Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Very Important Central Control Panel is back. Keeping the mysterious atmosphere and with even more mysteries. Control the omnipotence remote, experiment, and find many endings. Brainstorming in retro sci-fi style / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click.
